definition: easily obtained/readily available
saliva/to spit
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to

sentences.english: But such data has not been forthcoming from the countries of the region.
sentences.chinese: 但是这样的数据在该地区的各国并非唾手可得。

sentences.english: The infernal gate has been prepared, while the time of our final victory is at hand.
sentences.chinese: 狱火之门已经就绪，最终胜利唾手可得。

as easy as blowing off dust/effortless/with ease

definition: to yearn for sth even in one's dreams (idiom)/to long for sth day and night
easy/with no difficulty
